title: A fossilized foot found 15 years ago belonged to enigmatic human relative that lived alongside Lucy, scientists say
summary: Freshly unearthed jaw bones and teeth that were found close to a previously discovered foot suggest human relatives tried several ways of walking before honing in on one strategy.

title: أمن تطوان يوقف داعشيا كان في طور تنفيذ مخطط إرهابي وشيك
summary: تمكنت مصالح الشرطة بمدينة تطوان على ضوء معلومات استخباراتية دقيقة وفرتها المديرية العامة لمراقبة التراب الوطني، اليوم الأربعاء ، من توقيف أحد الموالين لتنظيم “داعش” الإرهابي، يبلغ من العمر 26 سنة، كان في طور تنفيذ مخطط إرهابي وشيك وبالغ الخطورة يستهدف المساس الخطير بالنظام العام. وذكر بلاغأكمل القر…
body: تمكنت مصالح الشرطة بمدينة تطوان على ضوء معلومات استخباراتية دقيقة وفرتها المديرية العامة لمراقبة التراب الوطني، اليوم الأربعاء ، من توقيف أحد الموالين لتنظيم “داعش” الإرهابي، يبلغ من العمر 26 سنة، كان في طور تنفيذ مخطط إرهابي وشيك وبالغ الخطورة يستهدف المساس الخطير بالنظام العام. وذكر بلاغ أكمل القراءة » المقالة أمن تطوان يوقف داعشيا كان في طور تنفيذ مخطط إرهابي وشيك fمنشورة على جريدة الصباح .

title: The Trump Administration’s Data Center Push Could Open the Door for New Forever Chemicals
summary: The EPA is prioritizing review of new chemicals to be used in data centers. Experts say this could lead to the fast approval of new types of forever chemicals—with limited oversight.

title: 'Portal to physics beyond the Standard Model': World's largest neutrino detector starts up — with incredible results
summary: Deep underground in southern China, there is a 20,000-ton tank of liquid that can detect neutrinos. Named JUNO, the detector's first results are in — and they're very promising.

title: Most modern dogs have wolf DNA from relatively recent interbreeding. Here's which breeds are the most and least 'wolfish.'
summary: About two-thirds of modern dog breeds carry some wolf ancestry introduced within the past few thousand years.

title: Boeing's Next Starliner Flight Will Only Be Allowed to Carry Cargo
summary: After a high-profile malfunction left two astronauts stranded on the International Space Station, NASA is requiring rigorous testing before humans get back on board.

title: Therabody Promo Codes: 35% Off | November 2025
summary: Save on the science-backed devices you’ve been eyeing with 15% off Theragun discount code, up to $200 off TheraFace masks, and 35% off Black Friday deals.

summary:
Nature, Published online: 26 November 2025; doi:10.1038/d41586-025-03593-5

Using genomic data, researchers have uncovered the origins and cultural practices of the people of Shimao, a 4,000-year-old fortified settlement in north…
body: Nature, Published online: 26 November 2025; doi:10.1038/d41586-025-03593-5 Using genomic data, researchers have uncovered the origins and cultural practices of the people of Shimao, a 4,000-year-old fortified settlement in northern China.

title: ADHD diagnoses are growing. What’s going on?
summary:
Nature, Published online: 26 November 2025; doi:10.1038/d41586-025-03855-2

More children and adults are being diagnosed with ADHD in some countries. Science is helping to understand why — and how best to provide support.
body: Nature, Published online: 26 November 2025; doi:10.1038/d41586-025-03855-2 More children and adults are being diagnosed with ADHD in some countries. Science is helping to understand why — and how best to provide support.

title: 'Like a sudden bomb': See photos from space of Ethiopian volcano erupting for first time in 12,000 years
summary: Hayli Gubbi, a shield volcano in northern Ethiopia, erupted for several hours on the morning of Sunday, Nov. 23 — the first eruption since the start of the Holocene.

title: Marooned no more! Stranded Chinese astronauts finally have a way home following launch of unmanned 'lifeboat'
summary: China has launched an unmanned "lifeboat" to the Tiangong space station, ending a month-long fiasco. The spacecraft will eventually ferry home the marooned Shenzhou-21 crew, who have been stuck without a return capsule for over a week.

title: Award-winning astrophotographer Josh Dury recommends this telescope for budding astronomers. The price has already dropped to its lowest price this year
summary: An ideal beginner telescope that our expert reviewed earlier this year and recommends for those new to astronomy is now over $100 cheaper ahead of Black Friday.

title: Sistema Ox Bel Ha: A vast hidden system that's the longest underwater cave in the world
summary: This incredible submerged cave network is the longest of its kind in the world and plays a vital role in the region.

title: 'Hot knives and brute force': King Tut's mummy was decapitated and dismembered after its historic discovery. Then, the researchers covered it up.
summary: Irreversible damage was done to the pharaoh’s body.

title: 'I had never seen a skull like this before': Medieval Spanish knight who died in battle had a rare genetic condition, study finds
summary: The extremely long skull of a medieval knight points to an underlying genetic condition.

summary:
Nature, Published online: 25 November 2025; doi:10.1038/d41586-025-03802-1

COP30 negotiated efforts to protect forests and ramp up financial packages for climate action, but with one glaring omission: a road map to cut fossil fu…
body: Nature, Published online: 25 November 2025; doi:10.1038/d41586-025-03802-1 COP30 negotiated efforts to protect forests and ramp up financial packages for climate action, but with one glaring omission: a road map to cut fossil fuels.

title: ‘Anti-woke’ policies blamed for falling attendance at some US conferences
summary:
Nature, Published online: 25 November 2025; doi:10.1038/d41586-025-03869-w

Scientific meetings that support Black, Latino and Indigenous researchers are grappling with funding cuts and other restrictions.
body: Nature, Published online: 25 November 2025; doi:10.1038/d41586-025-03869-w Scientific meetings that support Black, Latino and Indigenous researchers are grappling with funding cuts and other restrictions.

title: Woolly mammoths fight off attacking saber-toothed cats in stunning new 'Prehistoric Planet' clip
summary: A clip from the upcoming series "Prehistoric Planet: Ice Age" shows how iconic ice age creatures adapted to their changing environment as temperatures rose and ice sheets started to melt.

title: Neanderthals cannibalized 'outsider' women and children 45,000 years ago at cave in Belgium
summary: Fragmented Neanderthal bones discovered in a cave in Belgium show that one group cannibalized the women and children of another group.

title: Ancient Egyptian pharaoh moved another ruler's body and stole his tomb, hundreds of funerary figurines suggest
summary: Archaeologists have discovered 225 shabtis — figurines meant to work for the deceased in the afterlife — in a pharaoh's tomb.

title: Why do some cat siblings look so different?
summary: Normally, siblings resemble each other. So why does a litter of kittens often come in a variety of colors?

title: Science history: Iconic 'Lucy' fossil discovered, transforming our understanding of human evolution — Nov. 24, 1974
summary: On an expedition in the Awash Valley in Ethiopia, two anthropologists uncovered the bones of a 3.2 million-year-old human ancestor. The iconic "Lucy" fossil would reveal much about our species' tangled family tree.

title: A ten-year drive to credit authors for their work — and why there’s still more to do
summary:
Nature, Published online: 24 November 2025; doi:10.1038/d41586-025-03860-5

Information about the roles of each author of a paper can help to build trust, integrity and responsible research assessment. Coordinated efforts are nee…
body: Nature, Published online: 24 November 2025; doi:10.1038/d41586-025-03860-5 Information about the roles of each author of a paper can help to build trust, integrity and responsible research assessment. Coordinated efforts are needed to consolidate progress.

title: Odd-looking rock on Mars is totally alien to the Red Planet, Perseverance rover finds
summary: NASA's Perseverance Mars rover recently came across an odd rock, dubbed "Phippsaksla," that is unlike anything else the robot has found on the Red Planet. It turns out that it probably isn't from our neighboring world and likely crashed on Mars instead.

title: Giant 'diamond ring' sparkles 4,500 light-years away in the Cygnus constellation — Space photo of the week
summary: NASA's SOFIA observatory captured a rare image of a glowing gas ring in Cygnus X — a vast star-forming region 4,500 light-years away.

title: Did Neanderthals have religious beliefs?
summary: Whether Neanderthals had religious beliefs is a subject of ongoing debate.

title: Canon 8x20 IS binocular review
summary: These compact binoculars are a must-have for any wildlife enthusiast, being Canon's lightest binos with image stabilization.

title: Scientists find rare tusked whale alive at sea for the first time — and shoot it with a crossbow
summary: Researchers have identified ginkgo-toothed beaked whales alive at sea for the first time after years of searching, and in doing so solved the mystery of an odd echolocation pulse in the North Pacific.

title: ماذا قال توم كروز عند تسلمة أول أوسكار في مسيرته الفنية؟
summary: أشاد النجم الأميركي توم كروز بتأثير السينما وقدرتها على تغيير حياة الناس، وذلك خلال تسلمه جائزة أوسكار فخرية في حفل نظمته أكاديمية فنون وعلوم الصور المتحركة في لوس أنجلوس، حيث احتفت هوليوود بمسيرته الممتدة لأكثر من 45 عاماً وبإسهاماته في صناعة السينما.
